name: Unique local selectors
description: Check for unique selectors inside same file. By default warning because list element can have same selector

name: Required root description
description: Check description at the root level

name: Required author
description: Check description at the root level has an author
help: add "author" property to the root description

name: Required method description
description: Check every compose method has description

name: Unique root selector
description: Check root selector is unique across all page objects
help: remove one of the page objects with same root selector: "%s" or "%s"

name: Root selector usage
description: Root selector should match only custom elements of the same type
help: change the element "%s" type to the type of the page object "%s"

name: Custom selector
description: Element with custom tag should have same type across all page objects
help: change the element "%s" type to the same type as the element "%s" in page object "%s"

name: Required metadata property
description: Check page object contains a metadata property with proper structure
help: add "metadata" property whose value is a non-empty object to the root
